name: Sausages VS Vegans
description:
This game was developped during the BBQ Game Jam of 2015 in Luxembourg by Thomas Winckell, Florian Perrotti, Fabrice Lauwérière, Quentin Sombsthay and Thibaud Frere,

The theme is about Sausages !

Vegans are being hunted by the ugly bavarian who fires sausages at them ! They must climb up while avoiding being hit by the Bavarian or being grilled !
